long_description: NEW FOR 2011 6 of our New Panther Martin Deluxe Holographic and Speckled Spinners in sizes 1/8oz and 1/4oz. These new lures have our fish catching holographic and speckled patterns along with our tried and true deluxe bodies. They are sure to catch more trout,bass,pike,salmon,steelhead,and walleye than ever.
